reviews.review: When you're not getting spinbotted by some 12 year old kid who downloaded this FREE game on his 2009 Dell Inspiron Mini 9 , you're getting random friend requests from some random Indian fuck asking to trade your p250 sand dune for his Stat-trak Factory New Bayonet Doppler and he only needs your steam login information.
Enjoy the game worth buying so you dont have to deal with hackers and just fun to mess around with friends
muy Buen juego si tenes prime, muchas veces si no tenes tocan cheaters y no te dan ganas de jugar
Отличная игра для тех кому скучно
Amazing Game!!!  I have over 1,000 hours in it and thousands spent in in-game items and its so much fun.  Be careful when trading though :)

Great game if youre planning on playing with friends or not playing on valves shit anticheat. However, if you are playing on valves servers, its horrible. Toxic people everywhere, hackers everywhere, a broken trust factor system, and a whole lot of smurfs and throwers. I recommend playing faceit/esea.
Melhor jogo de todos os tempos
